item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting, affordable, land-based group tour to the Galapagos Islands and Ecuador!

Join the club on a group tour July 29 - August 6, 2010 to The Galapagos Islands! You asked for an affordable way to see these amazing islands and we delivered! This group tour features daily yacht cruises, but you get to enjoy the comfort of staying at a land-based hotel at night. No overpriced, cramped cruise ships to deal with. We even added a day so you can take an optional SCUBA diving or snorkeling tour of these world-renown, warm & life filled waters.

The hotel is small, so space is limited and on a first come first served basis, so be sure to book your space early!

Price: $2,499 plus airfare (NO Single Supplement charge unless you specifically request a single room to yourself)

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Demand for this trip is very high and space is limited. Be sure to get your spot early, as spaces will go very quickly!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, visit our website or contact us at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: Galapagos Islands: An Affordable, Land Based Group Tour - 9 Days
